title: Printer's Sample Book, 1884
medium:
Medium: cotton samples adhered to paper, bound in cardboard
Technique: samples printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description: Textile sample book with formulas for dyestuffs.  From the Old Pacific Print Works, Lawrence, Mass.

tombstone.epitaph:
Printer's Sample Book, 1884.
1884. Medium: cotton samples adhered to paper, bound in cardboard
Technique: samples printed on plain weave. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-12.
